game.s_dis: Subway Surfers: Zurich takes the endless runner action to the scenic Swiss city, playable online unblocked with new characters, hoverboards, and themed collectibles.
game.l_dis:
Subway Surfers: Zurich â€“ Dash Through the Swiss Streets

Subway Surfers: Zurich immerses players in Zurich's charming cityscape. Run, jump, and slide along Swiss-themed subway tracks, dodging trains and collecting coins, Easter-themed items, and power-ups.

What is Subway Surfers: Zurich?

This edition is part of the World Tour series, featuring Zurich-themed subway environments, characters like Hugo and Rabbot (Easter special), and the Clockwork hoverboard. The update also included themed Weekly Hunts for collectible rewards.

How to Play Subway Surfers: Zurich?

  • Swipe Controls: Swipe up to jump, down to roll, left/right to switch lanes.
  • Collect Coins & Tokens: Gather coins, Easter items, and other collectibles to unlock Weekly Hunt rewards like hoverboards and keys.
  • Dodge Obstacles: Avoid trains, barriers, and Swiss-themed hazards while maintaining your run.
  • Use Power-Ups: Activate magnets, jetpacks, and hoverboards to extend your run and maximize your score.

Why Play Subway Surfers: Zurich Unblocked?

Enjoy the scenic Swiss city in Subway Surfers: Zurich online without restrictions, unlock new characters, boards, and themed collectibles while experiencing Zurich's unique charm.

Key Features

  • Zurich Environment: Explore the iconic streets, landmarks, and snowy scenery of Zurich.
  • Exclusive Characters & Boards: Unlock Hugo and Rabbot, along with the Clockwork hoverboard.
  • Endless Runner Gameplay: Classic swipe-based controls with a Swiss twist.
  • Special Collectibles: Participate in Weekly Hunts to collect Easter-themed items.
  • Unblocked Online: Play instantly in your browser anywhere.

Master Zurich's Subway Tracks!

Run, jump, and slide through Subway Surfers: Zurich to beat obstacles, collect rewards, and enjoy the scenic Swiss environment!
